===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# A brownish yellow ''wine'' used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] to "promote the flow of [[qi]] and activate blood circulation".

Depending on the place of manufacture, Sanbian Jiu consists of the following ingredients soaked in 40%-60% alcohol:
